abstract: Arrest reports released by New York Police Dept, while offering no evidence of connections between cases, reveals series of robberies in city by women targeting wealthy men at nightclubs and restaurants; in one such case, New York Knicks player Derrick Williams found items valued at more than $600,000 missing from his downtown apartment after two women accompanied him home from upscale club.
lead_paragraph: In several incidents this year, men have reported taking women home from restaurants and nightclubs only to find luxury goods have been stolen.

headline.main: Wealthy Men Are Targeted in Nightclubs, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Wealthy Men Being Targeted at Nightclubs, Police Say

snippet: In several incidents this year, men have reported taking women home from restaurants and nightclubs only to find luxury goods have been stolen.
